name: Space Shooter (Just for Fun)
description:
Controls:

PC: SpaceBar -> Shoot== Arrowleft -> Left,==ArrowRight -> Right

Phone/ Tablet: If Device Orientation API is supported on you device 

TiltLeft ->Left== TiltRight ->Right== TouchShip -> Shoot

Galaxian was made in 1979 and personally we've had a significant amount of fun playing it at our local arcade back in the days when that was a thing.  Part of that arcade culture has been embedded into our DNA, this is a work in progress, just a fun side project on our take of Galaxian. Feel free to leave a comment on what we could improve and add.
